title: "until we have better tools to help address abusive scenarios with strangers"
body: Like the already existing mute button?

replies.body: Nu gamers are a cancerous bunch of censorship nannies. Expect a flurry of down votes.

"Everyone who agrees with me is woke, everyone else is an idiot."

Are you aware of how biased that sounds?

It has nothing to do with agreeing with me it has to do with this cancerous new sentiment of banning anything deemed vaguely offensive and supporting massive iron fisted rules on every single game. 

Funny you say that, the irony being the other side is the one who wishes to constantly punish and silence.

How exactly is wishing people to be more free to say what they wish and expecting people to use a mute function biased? It would allow people like you to say what you wish as well. It's not remotely similar or biased.

> [{quoted}](name=vgamedude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UX97H74l,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-06T23:18:34.766+0000)
>
> It has nothing to do with agreeing with me it has to do with this cancerous new sentiment of banning anything deemed vaguely offensive and supporting massive iron fisted rules on every single game. 

In other words, people who hold a sentiment that you disagree with. Yep, I still don't see a difference.

> Funny you say that, the irony being the other side is the one who wishes to constantly punish and silence.

"It's not us it's them" is just a deflection. Do not avoid the point.

> How exactly is wishing people to be more free to say what they wish and expecting people to use a mute function biased? It would allow people like you to say what you wish as well. It's not remotely similar or biased.

That is not what you said. What you said was quite clearly a disparaging statement about the sorts of people who might disagree with the OP.

I do not think you are biased for thinking that people should be more free to speak, and thinking that people should use mute instead of getting offended.

I do however, think you are biased for thinking that insultees who have trouble muting their insultors are somehow stupid or inferior to those insultors.

See my response to the OP:

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UX97H74l,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-06T23:12:14.566+0000)
>
> I agree that players should know better and should have the wherewithal to mute a player who bullies them, but people lack self-awareness and self control.
> 
> If you want to hold players at fault for not realizing that they can and should mute others, then out of fairness you should also hold players at fault for losing their temper and harassing their teammates who annoy them.

Both sorts show the same lack of self-restraint.

So wanting everyone even people talking down or bad to me to be allowed to say things without heavy handed and greedy censorship on riots part is only defending people who agree with me? You're deluded.

And yes I will gladly disparage people who disagree with this sentiment for those people wish to silence that which they do not like not ever considering how it goes both ways.

> [{quoted}](name=vgamedude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UX97H74l,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-07T00:07:17.386+0000)
>
> So wanting everyone even people talking down or bad to me to be allowed to say things without heavy handed and greedy censorship on riots part is only defending people who agree with me? You're deluded.
> 
> And yes I will gladly disparage people who disagree with this sentiment for those people wish to silence that which they do not like not ever considering how it goes both ways.

I was not defending people who are censorship-happy. Please do not mistake me for somebody who thinks we should go around censoring people who say things we do not like. I was simply pointing out that you left no room in your definition of 'sides' of this debate for anybody to reside in the middle-ground.

It is not just 'us or them' there are a spectrum of opinions on this matter. Attempting to paint anyone who does not fully agree with and support you as being 100% against you does nothing to further the conversation, and it actually insults and pushes aside moderate people who might have otherwise been persuaded by your argument.

I agree that players should know better and should have the wherewithal to mute a player who bullies them, but people lack self-awareness and self control.

If you want to hold players at fault for not realizing that they can and should mute others, then out of fairness you should also hold players at fault for losing their temper and harassing their teammates who annoy them.
